attributes.action: Change the Petition System to have both FOR and AGAINST choices and therefore become meaningful
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Web technology gives the facility of choosing to either support or oppose a petition by using "Radio Buttons" to choose FOR or AGAINST. Only then will people be able to more accurately judge the overall response to a particular proposal.

rejection.details: This has been considered - see http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
